text: Mario Brito (born April 9, 1966) is a former baseball player born in the Dominican Republic.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=brito-001mar He played for the Yomiuri Giants in the Central League.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=brito-001mar ==References== Category:Dominican Republic baseball players Category:Yomiuri Giants players Category:1966 births Category:Living people
title: Mario Brito
